description:
Legendary weapons for your Wu officers will be added.
Enjoy fighting battles in an all-new way.

■Content
Legendary Weapons for:
Zhou Yu, Sun Shangxiang, Sun Jian, Taishi Ci, Huang Gai, Sun Ce, Xiaoqiao, Daqiao, and Han Dang

■How to use
You can change Weapons from camp by selecting "Weapons" - "Equip Weapons".
name: Legendary Weapons Wu Pack 1
